nodes.text: Drakka were a type of six-legged spiked boar native to Randon. Immense beasts, they were used by the Randoni as guards of their vaults. A spiked spine-ridge was the boars built in defense system, while a spiked tail served as a club against attackers and prey. Much of the drakka's bodies were covered with rust-brown scales. It was said that a sort of telepathy existed between a drakka and its master.
